text:
Thought so, yeah so the client I usually have to do this for has a php server that i’ve just always used (since before serverless functions came to HubSpot)
But might be a good time to try it out, I guess custom functions in workflows would work but they don’t have ops hub…

Hey Lukas — if you want to use DND functionality on your page and intermix it with dynamic content, and easy solution would be to just make modules out of the pieces that you want to have pulling from hubdb. But the design of the modules would be relatively influenced by the design of the page your trying to build. Sometimes it makes more sense to limit the content teams ability to move modules around on the page so the dynamic content always ends up looking how it is supposed to.
It looks like "folders" is now an option in Products
is it possible to adjust list membership based on folder?
